title: My Brother's Keeper
description: When single mother Diane Forrester realizes that her latest patient is none other than Alex Beaumont, the man who had shown her a glimpse of heaven before devastating her hopes and dreams eight years ago, her safe little world is rocked to its core. She had picked up the pieces of her life after her encounter with the Beaumonts and made a new life for her and her son in Cape Town, believing that she would never have to face the man again who had abused her young heart and misread her character so completely.But here he was, back in her life, because as the resident physiotherapist she was ethically compelled to treat him. Fortunately, she was no longer a naive twenty-year-old who would respond to that dark magic that he could still weave. This time, she was older, wiser, and very aware of her obligations to her son. She would not fall for his magic again, no matter how strong or attractive it became.Will Alex be able to erase the hurts of the past? Or will their history and the memories her difficult childhood deny them the chance at happiness they both so richly deserve?This is the first English novel by award-winning South African romance novelist, Sophia Kapp.
author: Sophia Kapp
